name: Row Column Definition
description: This specifies the format of a column in terms of a segment field name, a data type, and a maximum length.

fields.name: Segment Field Name
fields.description: The HL7 segment field name, which identifies the field occupying the column. Refer to Section 2.A.59.1, "Segment Field Name (ST)," for segment field name definition conventions.

fields.name: Hl7 Data Type
fields.description: The two or three character HL7 data type. Refer to HL7 Table 0440 - Data Types in section 2.15, "Data Types" for valid values.

fields.name: Maximum Column Width
fields.description: The maximum width of the column, as dictated by the responding system. This may vary from the HL7-defined maximum field length.
